title.narrative: Preservation of Indigenous Gule Wamkulu, Vimbuza, and Mbona Traditional Dance

description.narrative: Traditional performances of the Chewa, Tumbuka, and Manganja peoples, such as the Gule Wamkulu, Vimbuza, and Mbona dances, are masterpieces of intangible heritage of humanity handed down over many centuries.
